mapper.insert: insert into question(q_no, q_name, q_content, q_date, q_email, q_writer) values('QN'||to_char(systimestamp + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR),'YYYYMMDDFF3')||dbms_random.string('x',3), #{q_name}, #{q_content}, #{q_date}, #{q_email}, #{q_writer})
insert into answer(a_no, a_content, a_date, q_no) values('AN'||to_char(systimestamp + (INTERVAL '9' HOUR),'YYYYMMDDFF3')||dbms_random.string('x',3),#{a_content},#{a_date},#{q_no})
